full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement: Cost Consultant Services - Modified Design Build**

**Reference Number:** MX-22688721318
**Amendment Number:** 4
**Solicitation Number:** HOSO2201
**Publication Date:** February 22, 2023
**Closing Date and Time:** April 19, 2023, 2:00 PM (Eastern Time)
**Tender Status:** Expiring

**Overview:**
Defence Construction Canada (DCC) is seeking proposals from consulting firms to establish a Standing Offer (SO) for providing cost consulting services on a "quasi-continuous" basis, as required, for various Department of National Defence projects across Canada.

**Service Description:**
The Contract requires consulting firms to provide professional cost consulting services, specifically tailored to the requirements of the Department of National Defence. The proponents will be evaluated according to the criteria outlined in the Request for Abbreviated Proposals (RFAP).

**Security Requirements:**
The Security Requirements for this project are specified in the RFAP documents.

**Contract Details:**
The SO will be established for a period of three (3) years, with an estimated maximum value of $1,800,000.00. Call-ups under the SO are expected to be valued between $60,000.00 and $300,000.00.

**Eligibility and Submittal Requirements:**
Firms interested in considering themselves qualified to provide these services are invited to submit their Abbreviated Proposals through the MERX Electronic Bidding System on or before the closing date and time indicated on the Electronic Bidding System. Bidders can access the RFAP document and other bidding information at http://www.merx.com. Fees may apply; refer to the MERX website (https://www.merx.com/public/pricing) for further information.

**Contact Information:**
For more details on this tender, contact [Jacob Lachapelle](mailto:jacob.lachapelle@dcc-cdc.gc.ca), Phone: (343) 550-4560.

**Notice Documents:**
You can obtain the RFAP document, bidding information, and other relevant details at the address listed above. **This tender is expiring**.

**Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), **Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), and the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA) apply to this tender.**
